[00:00.00]WAKE UP (Explicit) - Travis Scott
[00:03.50]Lyrics by：Jacques Webster/Abel Tesfaye/Adam Feeney/Rupert Thomas/Nima Jahanbin/Paimon Jahanbin/Mike Dean
[00:07.01]Composed by：Jacques Webster/Abel Tesfaye/Adam Feeney/Rupert Thomas/Nima Jahanbin/Paimon Jahanbin/Mike Dean
[00:10.51]The Weeknd：
[00:24.85]I don't wanna wake up
[00:27.80]I want you spread out on the sheets
[00:31.16]Said her p**sy so good
[00:34.46]And her p**sy so sweet oh
[00:37.60]I don't wanna wake up
[00:40.59]I want it flowing through my streams
[00:44.49]Getting me hot
[00:47.69]Under my feet
[00:50.53]I don't wanna wake up
[00:52.30]Travis Scott：
[00:53.40]Please don't wake me up I feel it creeping yeah
[00:56.59]Controlling how you moving lucid dreaming dreams
[00:59.67]Always on the side of different seasons yeah yeah
[01:04.27]Took the belt-way down to your hood it's lit
[01:07.00]Say you was in the crowd I never looked
[01:09.72]Looking back how things came back around
[01:11.97]Guess I was hooked
[01:12.97]Burn the bread and then we burn the town
[01:15.17]We both was cooked yeah
[01:16.99]Nah nah please don't wake me up feel like I'm dreamin'
[01:21.39]Any given Sunday you can get it Willie Beamen
[01:24.64]I can make your Mondays even better like the weekend yeah
[01:27.94]That's my coco I'm her Ice-T coco
[01:31.17]Bend her over for some piping it's lit
[01:34.28]Bust a cloud shoot the lightning pop it
[01:37.69]Pop it now no we can't sleep
[01:40.30]The Weeknd：
[01:42.14]I don't wanna wake up yeah
[01:45.26]Want you spread out on the sheets it's lit
[01:48.55]Say p**sy so good pop it
[01:51.75]Oh p**sy so sweet yeah
[01:55.40]When I wake up yeah yeah
[01:58.13]Wanna drop top on the beach straight up
[02:01.75]Getting me high yeah yeah
[02:05.09]Under my feet
[02:08.28]When I wake up
[02:09.53]The Weeknd：
[02:10.24]You decide if I live or die
[02:12.70]When you're close I'm alive I can feel the sky
[02:16.56]I just want your body close to me oh
[02:21.37]And if I O.D.
[02:23.82]I'll be alone with no heartbeat
[02:27.78]I hope they kill us with a ghost in the Lambo
[02:31.06]And the doors going up suicide
[02:33.82]I don't wanna wake up
[02:35.03]I don't wanna wake up
[02:36.73]I want you spread out on the sheets
[02:38.30]Want you spread out on the sheets
[02:40.09]'Cause that p**sy so good
[02:41.82]P**sy so good yeah
[02:43.28]Girl that p**sy so sweet
[02:45.54]So sweet
[02:46.51]I don't wanna wake up
[02:48.15]I don't wanna wake up
[02:49.60]I want it flowing through my streams
[02:51.21]Want it flowing through my streams
[02:52.97]Ha getting me hot
[02:54.81]Getting me hot
[02:56.10]Oh under my feet
[02:58.50]My feet
[02:59.40]I don't wanna wake up yeah
data.trans:
[ti:WAKE UP (Explicit)]
[ar:Travis Scott]
[al:ASTROWORLD (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.50]//
[00:07.00]//
[00:10.51]//
[00:24.85]我不想醒来
[00:27.80]我想和你在床上缠绵
[00:31.16]她的身材很性感
[00:34.46]风韵十足
[00:37.60]我不想醒来
[00:40.59]我想让我们亲密无间
[00:44.49]让我热血沸腾
[00:47.69]欲火蔓延至全身
[00:50.53]我不想醒来
[00:52.30]//
[00:53.40]不要把我叫醒 我感觉她在向我靠近
[00:56.59]我可以控制你的身体 就像掌控自己的梦境一样
[00:59.67]季节变换 我一直在你身边
[01:04.27]沿着8号环城公路 回到你的家乡 
[01:07.00]你说你就在人群中 但我一直没看到
[01:09.72]回顾我们的过往
[01:11.97]我想我被你迷住了
[01:12.97]我们的热情可以烤熟面包 甚至烧毁整个城市
[01:15.17]我们都无法逃脱
[01:16.99]请不要叫醒我 我感觉像是在做梦
[01:21.39]我就像电影《Any given Sunday》中的主角Willie Beamen 你懂的
[01:24.64]只要有了我 你的周一会过得比周末还开心
[01:27.94]我跟她就像Ice T和Coco Austin一样般配
[01:31.17]让她弯下腰 好好伺候我 
[01:34.28]拨云见日 爱情的火花四射
[01:37.69]现在就狂欢一场吧 我不想睡觉
[01:40.30]//
[01:42.14]我不想醒来
[01:45.26]我想和你在床上缠绵
[01:48.55]她的身材很性感
[01:51.75]风韵十足
[01:55.40]当我醒来时
[01:58.13]想要把车开到沙滩上 放下敞篷
[02:01.75]我很兴奋
[02:05.09]欲火蔓延至全身
[02:08.28]当我醒来时
[02:09.53]//
[02:10.24]你掌握着我的生死
[02:12.70]你靠近我时 我充满活力 好像要飞上天
[02:16.56]我想让你靠近我
[02:21.37]等我老了
[02:23.82]我会孤独一人 心跳停止
[02:27.78]希望那时我们能死在兰博基尼车里
[02:31.06]车子装着朝上的自由式车门
[02:33.82]我不想醒来
[02:35.03]我不想醒来
[02:36.73]我想和你在床上缠绵
[02:38.30]想和你在床上缠绵
[02:40.09]她的身材很性感
[02:41.82]身材很性感
[02:43.28]女孩 你风韵十足
[02:45.54]风韵十足
[02:46.51]我不想醒来
[02:48.15]我不想醒来
[02:49.60]我想让我们亲密无间
[02:51.21]想让我们亲密无间
[02:52.97]让我热血沸腾
[02:54.81]热血沸腾
